description.text:
If you like slimy things so much, maybe we should try find one of these $(b;spring)frogs$()! 
 -The pixie hold the book to your face so you can see the image - 
These frogs regularly drop slime balls while hopping around...We definitely have to $(b;spring)pet$() this one!

Slimy yet cute! Oh Ssst! Listen!...They make a funny sound. Its like nature's music...

-You and the pixie listen to the beautiful croaking concert-
